storyInfo: The Self-Salvation Corps suffers internal strife over their course of action, while Siege insists on returning to Norport Borough to back up her Glasgow friends. At the same time, all Self-Salvation Corps bases find themselves under assault. The situation is dire.

attributes.content: Amiya, Doctor. You're here.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Haha, as you can see, the morale here... is rather low right now.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: It's a mess, but please pay it no mind. Ever since Allerdale... left, our logistics have been in shambles.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But given the problems we face, this is the best solution we have.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We lost many men in our last battle. We once thought that these sacrifices would not be in vain, and that as long as we stopped the Sarkaz's projects, everything would still be salvageable.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Regrettably, they acted much faster than we anticipated.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The Sarkaz... Not only do they have the Shard, they also built that 'airship.'
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The report has been distributed to everyone. The airship attacked the Duke of Windermere's army out in the open. The illusion of peace has shattered.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: As for the Shard... if the Sarkaz willingly started this war, then their control of the Shard... must have proceeded much further along than we expected.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I'm too afraid to make this gamble.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Allerdale once told me the legend of this sword.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: She said that the Sighs of Kings, capable of rending Catastrophes asunder, is Victoria's strongest shield, with which the country can defend against the storms pulled toward it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Then she must also have told you that the 'Stone of the Sword' beneath the palace exists precisely because there are few who can activate this power.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Siege, do you really feel nothing from the sword?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Maybe... I don't know, like a sense of being summoned? Or perhaps there's a low heat? Maybe you can suddenly use some really wicked Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You just... might actually be able to...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: No, nothing.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The sword is cold and hard. It's a little lighter to swing than a hammer, and not very easy to control your strength with.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Is there nothing else? If any part of you feels a little bit off—
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We should have this polished before it sees the battlefield again. It's a little rusted.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It seems we can't count on the sword doing us much of a good turn and helping us fend off the threat from the Shard for the time being.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: But it also won't become a bargaining chip in the dukes' internal strife.;The Sarkaz might just think twice before they activate the Shard.

attributes.content: Right, Doctor of Rhodes Island. It is better for this sword to be under our control than any other faction. At the very least, being able to prevent it from becoming an accomplice to this war is important enough.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Important enough...? This is important enough...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: (Hushed) Allerdale, if only I...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Please don't get discouraged, Siege. Maybe you just haven't gotten the hang of it, or it's not time yet.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm just about done analyzing that supply line, Doctor.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's practically guaranteed that the starting point is rural Brentwood, but it's got a lot of endpoints.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Aside from the munitions factory in Highbury, it's very likely they have a route that extends right underneath the Shard.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Argh, we found out way too late. If only we'd found out a month—no, ten days sooner, things probably wouldn't have turned out the way they have.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That said, the intel about this supply route is still meaningful, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: If this route is capable of the transport of heavy supplies and leads straight to the bottom of the Shard—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: We can transport more than supplies there.;This is an opportunity for a counter-offensive.

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: With war having broken out, there may not be a lot of guards around Theresis. Each lord of the Royal Court has to command their subordinates to fend off the dukes.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The liches joining the fray would be a problem... but from what I know about them, they wouldn't truly pick a side. Besides, I'm sure Dame Kal'tsit talked to their Messenger before.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I just hope that they opted to follow her advice.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Now, we'd best—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Vina, you ought to at least bring up what happened in Norport!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It's our turf that those Sarkaz arseholes gutted out! Baird is still there!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Bloody bastards! Instead of a counter-offensive on their supply line, we should be helping them!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Calm down. We must think about the whole situation...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You little twat, you think being a knight gives you the right to teach me to look at the big picture? I don't give a shite about wiping out some old Sarkaz monsters. My friends are in danger. My home is in danger!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: And you want me to bloody stand aside and do nothing?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: No, I know you're restless, but we must consider all possibilities.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I do not recommend splitting up. Until we are certain the ones who attempted to take the Realmblade have given up, you'd best...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Best cower underground like cowards? Give me a break! We can take care of those sneaky bastards! What we have to do now is—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Enough, Indra.
attributes.name: Siege
Indra
attributes.content: Fine.
When will the operation targeting Theresis commence?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Not very soon. We need time to observe the supply line's specific situation.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The Shard's internal structure needs to be investigated too. Theresis... He's powerful. Letting our guards down would only spell our doom.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: How long will it take more specifically?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Less than half a month. I hope to put a stop to all this before he truly activates the Shard.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: That's good enough.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I am requesting a temporary leave before this operation. Please rest assured that I will be back before the operation is to commence.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: So you insist on going to Norport.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I've lost enough friends already, Clovisia.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I can't just do nothing over and over again.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I am making this request out of my personal feelings, yes. I won't try to hide this.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But at the same time, I think this is an opportunity. Before our normal operation officially begins, we can first remove certain hidden threats.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: For example... those who hurt Allerdale and those who want the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That's without a doubt a duke. No matter what position he is planning to take, I think... I should have a... conversation with him.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Ascalon said this already, but time is not on our side.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I will handle this properly.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doctor, what do you think?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: There are still things worthy of our attention on that plate.

attributes.content: Right... The Sarkaz airship is very likely docked in Norport.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And this also implies...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She... Theresa might be there.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In this war, we will have to face her sooner or later.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is another thing. Logos mentioned to me—
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Emergency... ission... Emergency...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: The Sarkaz ambushed... the Camden Borough safe house... We.... Their forces...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Urghh—
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Camden? What's going on?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Alert... The safe house at Auchterigg...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: ...being ambushed...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Feist! The safe house in Highbury is under attack!
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What's the situation over there?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We're mounting a counter attack and are evacuating underground. The situation's dire. It's likely that the Sarkaz have...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: This is not a simple annihilation. They are planning to...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: ...must...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Granny? Granny, do you hear me?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Drat, the transmission's cut off!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What's going on? We have three safe houses under attack by the Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Their communications have been cut off. We must back them up immediate—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No, it's not just the three safe houses.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Our communications have been cut off.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Get down, Doctor!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Clovisia, what's going on?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: How can this be? Here...? This place is top-secret within the Self-Salvation Corps!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Logos mentioned to me that it's possible the Sarkaz have infiltrated our intelligence network.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Based on the situation we now find ourselves in, I can only assume that the failure of our confidentiality far exceeds what we anticipated.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: It's very likely that all Self-Salvation Corps bases are under attack.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We must evacuate!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Where can we go, though...?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Everyone, the Sarkaz assault is fierce. They've had their eyes on this place for a long time, and the routes on the surface have already fallen.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: They—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The mid-level buffer zone has been breached, too.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Doctor, the enemy is using a new Sarkaz witchcraft device. With their numbers and strength... Our Defense Forces and Self-Salvation Corps friends won't be able to withstand this assault.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Truth be told, we have no chance of winning. Robben, who's in charge of organizing defense, won't last very long.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: How much time can they buy us?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Fifteen minutes... No, half an hour.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That's all the time we have.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Evacuate? Where are we supposed to run? There isn't anywhere safe for the Self-Salvation Corps to go in Londinium!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The equipment factory's third warehouse? The carpark at the Four Seasons Department Store? Maybe Viscount Byrne's mansion...?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: No, they're all too risky.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: There has to be somewhere else...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: If it's dangerous everywhere in Londinium, we can evacuate the city for the time being.

attributes.content: Evacuate Londinium?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Right! The Sarkaz supply line!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We can use the supply line in Highbury and get the hell out of Londinium!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We've got too many wounded men and non-combatants. Taking an underground route will help us avoid most of the fighting!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But all our work in Londinium...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The onslaught we are facing tells us that they simply thought they had no need to wipe us out before.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Now that war has broken out, the Military Commission has started to truly see the Self-Salvation Corps as a threat.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We have no time to hesitate.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I need to head out immediately to back Robben up. We will try to draw the Sarkaz main force's attention the best we can to cover your evacuation.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Amiya, Doctor. The Self-Salvation Corps will need your assistance in this evacuation.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We will never abandon our allies.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Ascalon, mount a breakout.;Misery, destroy all files.

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I am on it.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: Help Horn and her team buy us time.

attributes.content: Rest assured, Doctor.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I will guarantee your safety.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Before we could finalize plans to relocate and secure our communications... The Royal Court picked the perfect time for this annihilation operation.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: It seems they know us better than we ever imagined.

attributes.content: Theresis has also gotten sharper... not like when he was simply pretending.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: If it's certain that this place will fall, I guess... it won't matter if we go all out.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Logos, we will be back!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You can rebuild this place.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Next, we need to find the entrance to the Highbury supply route.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: Feist, this is where you come in.;Rockrock, you know the underground passages better than anyone.

attributes.content: Understood. Everyone, come with me.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rest assured, I will evacuate safely with the wounded.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.options: Closure, take all the wounded and non-combatants and go with them.
I'm counting on you and Shining to take care of Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: Wha? Huh?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, Dr. {@nickname}, what kind of sick joke is this?! If I'm supposed to be a non-combatant, then so are you!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You bet your ass I can beat the crap out of you! It's you who should be evacuating with the rest of them!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Amiya and Ascalon will make sure I will be safe.;We will hold the Sarkaz pursuers. This is the safest way.

attributes.content: Doctor... I won't let you get hurt.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Tsk, crafty dipshit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So, we've got three teams.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Horn, Misery, and Logos will lead the primary operation to resist the Sarkaz assault. Doctor, you go with Amiya and Siege's gang to hold the other Sarkaz pursuers.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Shining and I will follow the rest of the Self-Salvation Corps and evacuate this place without making any noise.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Where are we gonna meet up in the end?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The small town outside Londinium... Brentwood.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Alright, objective confirmed.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We're now in war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It won't spare any one of us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we also... mustn't lose hope.
attributes.name: Amiya
